text: Ndipo ndiye amene anakulengani kukhala mibadwo yodza pambuyo pa mibadwo yina, kulowa m’malo mwa uzake padziko lapansi. Ndipo anakukwezani m’maudindo, ena kuposa anzawo kuti akhoza kukuyesani ndi zimene wakupatsani. Ndithudi Ambuye wanu ndi wachangu polanga koma ndithudi Iye amakhululuka, Mwini chisoni chosatha
